product_name: The North Face Get Down Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: The Get Down insulated jacket by The North Face boasts waterproof protection, goose down insulation and go-anywhere style to ensure you're warm and protected from first chair to last call. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Insulated with quality 550-fill-power down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. External chest pocket; zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket; internal media pocket. Adjustable, detachable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit; hood can be secured to jacket so it doesn't flap around. Snap-down powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out. Adjustable belt, drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to help retain warmth. The North Face Get Down women's insulated jacket has a relaxed fit.
short_description: The Get Down insulated jacket by The North Face boasts waterproof protection, goose down insulation and go-anywhere style to ensure you're warm and protected from first chair to last call.
